name: Island Home
description:
You are Bernard, a man who lives on a floating island. He leaves his possessions around the islands around his home. There is goo closing in from the outside, destroying the islands. It will stop before it touches Bernard's home island. You need to help him collect the possessions he values most to make his home comfortable. You have limited time, so only choose the items you would make your home out of. You can modify your house and the world as needed.

This game was made for the Global Game Jam 2019

https://globalgamejam.org/2019/games/island-home-0

Credits: 

Hunter Presny - Game Designer, Pixel Art

Benjamin Fulkerson-Bird - Programming, Music

CurtisCreatesGames - Programming, Art

Mitch Carroll - Programming
